messages.subject: personal growth / mindfulness
messages.msgSnippet: -=-I ve been noticing that it s making me more honest with myself.-=- -=-I think a lot of reasons people have for controling their kids don t stand up to the
messages.messageBody:
-=-I've been noticing that it's making me more honest with myself.-=-
-=-I think a lot of "reasons" people have for controling their kids
don't stand up to the light very well-=-

And that is mindfulness. Hear yourself thinking. Feel yourself feeling.
Examine what you think you know without justifying every thought you have. Try
to turn off the many voices in your head and see things quietly.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
